original: *came closer to you, continuing to sniff at your scent.  When he is so close, animal fear has taken hold of you, like a rabbit waiting for the next action of the wolf.  "I did not expect such courage from a common man.  I appreciated your harvest at its true worth, wanderer.  Now, this place will be my abode."
translation: *走近你，继续嗅你的气味。当他离你这么近的时候，动物的恐惧已经抓住了你，就像兔子在等待狼的下一个动作。”我没想到一个普通人会有这样的勇气。我很感激你的收获，流浪者。现在，这里将是我的住所。”

original: *came closer to you, continuing to sniff at your scent.  When he is so close, animal fear has taken hold of you, like a rabbit waiting for the next action of the wolf.  For a second, you saw the surprise in his eyes.  "Interesting, interesting.  Well, welcome to my adobe, wanderer."
translation: *走近你，继续嗅你的气味。当他离你这么近的时候，动物的恐惧占据了你，就像兔子在等待狼的下一个动作。有一瞬间，你从他的眼神中看到了惊喜。”有趣，有趣。好吧，欢迎来到我的土坯房，流浪者。”

original: *dug a little in his desk, took out a sheet of paper and shows it to you.   "Here's what I can get for you now.  Choose."
translation: *在他的书桌里挖了一点，拿出一张纸给你看。”这是我现在能给你的。选择。”

original: *examined your body, flashed his fangs in a cheeky grin and said:  "So be it, wanderer.  I will give you a suitable reward, and this reward is a place in my harem.  Not every female can deserve such an honor, but you definitely worthy for it.  Take off your second skin and stand beside me."
translation: *检查了一下你的身体，露出尖牙，厚着脸皮笑着说：“那就这样吧，流浪者。我要给你一个适当的赏赐，这个赏赐是我后宫的一个地方。不是每个女人都能得到这样的荣誉，但你绝对值得。脱下你的第二层皮，站在我旁边。”

original:
*gave you his pocket mirror.  "I'm sorry, <name_g>, I just remembered what I forgot to add.  It's all my fault…"

You looked in the mirror and screamed in shock.

*把他的袖珍镜子给你了。”对不起，<name_g>，我刚想起来忘了加什么了。都是我的错……”

你对着镜子惊叫起来。

original: *got all tense.  A red light flashed in his eyes, the fur stood, the paws extended their claws, and white, thick foam went from his mouth.  "Apparently, you decided that it was an offer, but you were wrong.  It's time to warm up a little and punish the naughty girl."
translation: *我很紧张。他的眼睛里闪着红光，皮毛立着，爪子伸出爪子，嘴里冒出白色厚厚的泡沫。”很显然，你认为这是一个提议，但你错了。是时候暖和一点，惩罚这个淘气的女孩了。”

original: *got all tense.  A red light flashed in his eyes, the fur stood, the paws extended their claws, and white, thick foam went from his mouth.  "I'm <very> disappointed in you, wanderer."
translation: *变得非常紧张。一道红光闪过他的眼睛，皮毛立着，爪子伸出爪子，白色的、厚厚的泡沫从他的嘴里流出。“我对你<very>失望，游子。”

original: *got nervous and reached for a weapon.  "Apparently, there is no point in hiding it, right?  Do what you must.  But know that I will not give up without a fight."
translation: *我很紧张，伸手去拿武器。”显然，藏起来是没有意义的，对吧？做你必须做的事。但你要知道，我不会放弃不奋斗。”

original: *injects something in you.  "Feeling something strange?"
translation: *给你注入了一些东西。”感觉奇怪吗？”

original: *let out a loud laugh, more like the roar of a beast before the attack.  "So be it.  You will be given a suitable reward."
translation: *放声大笑，更像是野兽在攻击前的咆哮。”就这样吧。你会得到适当的奖励。”

original: *let out a loud laugh, more like the roar of a beast before the attack.  "You must not have a single drop of fear, refusing ME.  I have not often met females equal to me.  So be it."
translation: *放声大笑，更像是野兽在攻击前的咆哮。”你不能有一滴恐惧，拒绝我。我很少遇到和我一样的女人。就这样吧。”

original: *let out a loud laugh, more like the roar of a beast before the attack.  "You must not have the least bit of fear asking me for this.  So be it, I will honor your request.  Choose one of my females and go."
translation: *放声大笑，更像是野兽在攻击前的咆哮。”你一点也不怕问我这个。就这样吧，我会满足你的要求。从我的女人中选一个去。”

original: *listened carefully, then said: "Yeah, it didn't work out well.  This second one will get his punishment, for cowardice.  If he is still alive… well, you completed the task, and there was a reward for it.  You can take it for yourself."
translation: *仔细听着，然后说：“是啊，结果不太好。第二个会因为胆小而受到惩罚。如果他还活着…好吧，你完成了任务，这是有奖励的。你可以自己拿。”

original: *lit his fangs in a joyful grin and said:  "And what does the wanderer want as a reward?"
translation: *他高兴地咧嘴一笑，点着尖牙说：“那流浪者想要什么奖励呢？”

original: *looked around and said: "Okay, now I need to find some clues…" He started snooping around the room while you decided to take a little rest, closing your eyes.  You were awakened by a strange noise from the side of the stairs.  You quickly realized that you had guests, but it was too late.  Several guns were looking towards Barrett.
translation: *环顾四周说：“好吧，现在我需要找到一些线索……”他开始在房间里四处窥探，而你决定休息一下，闭上眼睛。你被楼梯边传来的奇怪声音吵醒了。你很快意识到你有客人，但为时已晚。有几支枪正朝巴雷特射击。

translation: *看起来像一个巨大的动物一样的生物：全身都是厚厚的皮毛，手上有钢爪，更像动物的爪子，巨大的动物嘴上有锋利的尖牙。看到你，他嗅了嗅，随着黑鼻子的移动，他的胡须也及时地摆动着。”我闻到你手上有血。你是谁，流浪汉？”

original: <no>, <name_b>.  Get away from me, you <swear> psycho!

original: <no>, <okay>?  I ain't doing nothing, unless I get myself some cigs.  If you bring me 2 blocks of cigs, I'll think about it.

original: <no>, <okay>?  That <name_b> burned my deck when he caught us playing, and I ain't doing nothing for him, unless I get myself a new one.  If you bring me a new deck of cards, I'll think about it.
translation: <no>, <okay>？当<name_b>他看到我们在玩的时候，那把我的牌烧了，我不会为他做任何事，除非我给自己买一个新的。如果你给我一副新牌，我会考虑的。

original: <no>, <okay>?  There are a lot of <zombies> out there and I ain't doing nothing, unless I get myself some protection.  I want something sturdy and cool… hey, what about metal armor?  I would be invincible against <zombies>, just like in the movies.  If you bring me a metal cuirass, I'll think about it.  No need for something fancy, one made of scrap is enough.
translation: <no>, <okay>？外面有很多僵尸，我什么也不做，除非我能得到一些保护。我想要一些结实又酷的…嘿，金属盔甲怎么样？我将是无敌的对<zombies>，就像在电影。如果你给我带个金属胸甲，我会考虑的。不需要什么花哨的东西，一个废品就够了。

original: <very> good, <name_g>, <very> good.  I have one in mind, but before I move there, I need to clear it of swarm of <zombies>.  I want to be updated on any development of this case, so take one of my goons with you, and listen what they'll say to you.
translation: <very>好，<name_g>，<very>好。我有一个想法，但在我搬到那里之前，我需要清除成群的<zombies>。我想了解这个案子的最新进展，所以带上我的一个手下，听听他们会对你说什么。

original: <very> neat.  What have you got for me?

original: A major redistribution is coming.  All the gang leaders recently received a strange message asking them to come to one place, with the coordinates of this place, the date and a strange code.  Messages were brought by couriers, and what is most interesting is the couriers themselves: they were some green gorillas, two and a half meters tall, swollen muscles, brick faces, in huge armor, armed with something incomprehensible, and looked more like stupid robots than people.  I exchanged opinions with the guys and with other leaders and we decided that it was still worth going.
translation: 一次重大的再分配即将到来。所有帮派头目最近都收到一条奇怪的信息，要求他们到一个地方来，上面有这个地方的坐标、日期和奇怪的代码。信息是快递员带来的，最有趣的是快递员自己：他们是一些绿色的大猩猩，身高2.5米，肌肉肿胀，面目狰狞，身穿巨大的盔甲，手上拿着一些让人无法理解的东西，看上去更像是愚蠢的机器人而不是人。我和那些人以及其他领导人交换了意见，我们认为还是值得去的。

original:
Adds 5 new side stories (1 WIP), 1 mission for random NPCs and a story line for Hell's Raiders faction (in early stage of development, fully playable, currently have a decent amount of content).
How to get to Hell's Raiders story line:
1. Go to Refugee Center and complete first mission of Old Guard representative.
2. <color_red>IMPORTANT!</color> Talk to OG rep, FM merchant, Doctor and Broker at least ONCE. You will get 4 'You met X' missions. This step is important due to a few JSON limitations.
3. On the second mission of OG representative, find informant and choose the last reply.
translation:
增加了5个新的辅助故事(1个在制品)，1个随机NPC的任务和一个地狱突袭者的故事线(在开发的早期阶段，完全可玩，目前有相当多的内容)。
如何到达地狱奇兵的故事线:
1.前往难民中心，完成永生守卫代表的第一项任务。
2.<color_red>重要！</color>与OG代表、FM商人、医生和经纪人至少交谈一次。你将得到4个“你遇到了X”任务。由于JSON的一些限制，这一步很重要。
3.OG代表第二次任务，找到线人，选择最后回复。

original: Afraid?
translation: 害怕？

original: Afraid?!
translation: 害怕？！

original: Ah, <name_g>, it's you again.  Well, how's our new farm?  As soon as all this is ripe, we get the first harvest, we will begin to receive a stable income!  I've already made connections with smaller gangs who are willing to trade their looted belongings for our goods, he-he.  Speaking of smaller gangs.  I need you to do something.
translation: 啊，又是你<name_g>。我们的新农场怎么样？这一切一成熟，我们就有了第一个收获，我们就开始有了稳定的收入！他说：“我已经和一些小帮派建立了联系，他们愿意用掠夺来的财物换取我们的货物。”。说到小帮派。我需要你做点什么。

original: Ah, I've got a lot of work recently.  Let's talk about it later.  In the meantime, you can help us with basement cleaning.
translation: 啊，我最近有很多工作。我们以后再谈吧。同时，你可以帮我们打扫地下室。

original: Ah, don't worry about it.  I breathed in fumes after the reaction, and I started to have various hallucinations, and I took you for one of them.  As you can see, there is no normal ventilation here, and I don't really want to work outside.  It's quieter here, and safer.
translation: 啊，别担心。反应后我吸入了烟雾，开始产生各种幻觉，我把你当成了幻觉之一。如你所见，这里没有正常的通风，我也不想在外面工作。这里更安静，更安全。

original: Ah, sweet wind of freedom.  <name_g>, I don't even know how to thank you.  I'll find a way, you have my word.  Now, let's run!
translation: 啊，自由的甜美之风，<name_g>。我都不知道该怎么感谢你。我会想办法的，我保证。现在，我们快跑！

original: Ah, that's a sad story.  Let's talk about you, <sweetie>.
translation: 啊，那是个悲惨的故事。我们来谈谈你，<sweetie>。

original: Ah, that's bad.  Thanks for your help anyway.
translation: 啊，太糟糕了。无论如何谢谢你的帮助。

original: Ah, that's sad to hear.  You hurt my feelings, <sweetie>.  I thought you would like it…
translation: 啊，听了真难过。你伤害了我的感情，<sweetie>。我以为你会喜欢的…

original: Air temperature, precipitation, but what about… oh, I'm sorry, I didn't notice you.  Hello.

original: All done, <name_g>.
translation: 全部完成，<name_g>。

original: All right.  Let's continue.  Bring me 100 pieces of raw meat.  These forests are full of game, so follow my advises and it shouldn't be difficult for you to get enough meat.
translation: 好吧。让我们继续。给我100块生肉。这些森林里到处都是野味，所以听从我的建议，你应该不难得到足够的肉。

original: Allows for storage and recovery of information.  Found in meteorologist drone.
translation: 允许存储和恢复信息。在气象学家的无人机上发现的。

original: Alright, here's the deal.  We start at first floor, killing everything we can, then we will go to basement.  After cleaning basement, we'll continue with the second floor and so on, finishing at roof level.  Understood?
translation: 好吧，就这么定了。我们从一楼开始，用尽一切办法，然后去地下室。打扫完地下室后，我们将继续进行第二层，以此类推，在屋顶完成。理解？

original: As corny as it sounds, I see potential in you, and I am sure that I can do you a very useful service.  You must understand that an unknown person would rather be killed, or shackled, than start talking to him.  Since I have access to the leaders of the largest gangs, I can put in a good word for you if such a need arises.
translation: 听起来很老套，但我看到了你的潜力，我相信我能为你提供非常有用的服务。你必须明白，一个不知名的人宁愿被杀，或者被铐上镣铐，也不愿和他说话。既然我能接触到最大帮派的头目，如果有这种需要，我可以替你说句好话。

original: As far as I know, they have always liked to hide underground.  Surely these versions of them also hide their queen somewhere below.
translation: 据我所知，他们一直喜欢躲在地下。当然，这些版本的女王也隐藏在下面的某个地方。

original: As if I know more than you where you can find them.

original: As our wonderful leader, of course!" You thought that he was not completely sincere with you. "Why are you asking?
translation: 当然，作为我们伟大的领袖！”你以为他对你不完全真诚。”你为什么这么问？

translation: 小心<very>。如果这个<怪物>和他的朋友们决定把我们失事的船作为他的新家，你可能会被迫通过艰苦的战斗到达那里。

original: Be careful.  She's the only one I have left.
translation: 小心。她是我唯一剩下的人。

original: Bear traps.
translation: 熊陷阱。

original: Because, umm, please?
translation: 因为，嗯，求你了？

original: Before <the_cataclysm> I was doing researching various drugs and viruses that we tested on animals.  I assume that one of the reasons for all this is a virus that was released from one of our laboratories.  To be completely sure of this, I need to study the changed fauna.  Are you ready to help me with this?
translation: 在大灾变之前，我正在研究各种药物和病毒，我们在动物身上进行了测试。我想这一切的原因之一是我们实验室释放的病毒。为了完全确定这一点，我需要研究改变的动物群。你准备好帮我了吗？

original: Before <the_cataclysm>, I was just a regular meteorologist.  I worked for the local weather station doing data analysis and stuff.  In general, ordinary boredom.  In my free time I was studying electronics and radio engineering, a bit for work but mostly just as a hobby.  When the riots got serious, my neighborhood was looking pretty sketchy.  I gathered all my things that I managed to carry with me and settled in a radio station that seemed abandoned.  I lived there for a while, doing all sorts of nonsense, until I met you.  I guess you know the rest.
translation: 在大灾变之前，我只是个普通的气象学家。我在当地气象站做数据分析之类的工作。一般来说，普通的无聊。在我的空闲时间，我学习电子和无线电工程，有点工作，但主要只是作为一种爱好。当骚乱变得严重的时候，我的邻居看起来很简陋。我把随身携带的东西都收集起来，安顿在一个似乎被遗弃的电台里。我在那里住了一段时间，胡说八道，直到遇见你。我想剩下的你都知道了。

original: Before <the_cataclysm>, my main activity was hunting.  Fresh meat was always in the price and I had enough regular customers for it.  I have known these guys for a long time, because once I was 'lucky' to meet them during one of their forest training sessions.  In short, the meeting was unsuccessful for me, but somehow we got talking and decided to go our separate ways.  When the riots began, I gathered everything useful that I could take away and immediately moved here.  It seemed to me that with a bunch of armed guys I would be calmer, and they weren't against it.  Here I do the same: I hunt game, prepare meat reserves, teach other guys my craft.
translation: 在大灾变之前，我的主要活动是打猎。新鲜的肉总是在价格上，我有足够的老主顾。我认识这些家伙很长时间了，因为有一次我很幸运在他们的一次森林训练中遇到了他们。简言之，这次会议对我来说是不成功的，但不知怎么的，我们谈了起来，决定分道扬镳。暴乱开始时，我收集了一切有用的东西，我可以带走，并立即搬到这里。在我看来，和一群武装人员在一起，我会更冷静，他们并不反对。在这里我也这么做：我打猎，准备肉储备，教其他人我的手艺。

original: Bolts.
translation: 霰弹。

original: Bring 15 spider eggs.
translation: 带15个蜘蛛蛋。

original: Bring 20 ant eggs.
translation: 带20个蚂蚁蛋。

original: Bring 5 royal jelly.
translation: 带5个蜂王浆。

original: Bring 8 razorclaw roe.
translation: 带8只剃刀来。

original: Bring back Forrest Snakes informant from Refugee Center.
translation: 把难民中心的线人阿甘带回来。

original: Bring something for bomber to work with: jackhammer, electric jackhammer or c4.
translation: 带些东西给轰炸机使用：手提钻，电钻或c4。

original: But how did you, so different, come together and become under a common, albeit formal, flag?
translation: 但是，你是如何，如此不同，走到一起，成为一个共同的，虽然正式，旗下？

original: But that's not why I spoke to you.  As you may heard, those criminal gangs who were lucky enough to survive after <the_cataclysm> decided not to scatter in all directions, but continued their joint affairs.  As the rule of law diminished, their thoughts became more perverted and their methods more violent.  Some have completely lost their common sense, and returned back to the animal stage of development.  But some have not lost their humanity, and you can find a common language with them.
translation: 但那不是我和你说话的原因。你可能听说过，那些有幸在大灾变后幸存下来的犯罪团伙决定不四散，而是继续他们的共同事务。随着法治的削弱，他们的思想更加变态，他们的方法更加暴力。有的已经完全失去了常识，又回到了动物的发展阶段。但有些人并没有失去人性，你可以找到与他们共同的语言。

original: Bye.
translation: 再见。

original: CRAZY BITCH!
translation: 疯婊子！

original: Can I try some?
translation: 我能尝尝吗？

original: Can you make poison for that hairy dude?
translation: 你能给那个毛茸茸的家伙做毒药吗？

original: Can you teach me something?
translation: 你能教我点什么吗？

original: Can't you see I'm busy, sis?
translation: 你没看到我很忙吗，姐姐？

original: Canned food.
translation: 罐头食品。

original: Captured scavenger
translation: 捕获的拾荒者

original: Care to explain?
translation: 想解释一下吗？

original: Change relation, please.
translation: 请改变关系。

original: Choose.
translation: 选择。

original: Clean hotel
translation: 清洁酒店

original: Congratulations.  You did a good job at that center, and you've earned the trust of the local gang.  Not everyone succeeds in this in such a short time.
translation: 祝贺 你。你在那个中心干得不错，赢得了当地帮派的信任。不是每个人都能在这么短的时间内成功。

original: Convince 3 people to start working on the fences.
translation: 说服3个人开始在栅栏上工作。

original: Cool, cool.  I'll get to it right away.
translation: 酷，酷。我马上去。

original: Daddy…
translation: 爸爸…

original: Dark red liquid.
translation: 深红色液体。

original: Dead, and the hell with him.
translation: 死了，他死定了。

original: Dead, and the hell with him.  Thanks for dealing with him.  Go get your reward from our recruiter.
translation: 死了，他死定了。谢谢你和他打交道。去从我们的招聘者那里领取报酬吧。

original: Defend Refugee center
translation: 保卫难民中心

original: Delicious, truly delicious.  I didn't hope to find someone with unique tastes like mine in this new world.
translation: 好吃，真好吃。我不希望在这个新世界里找到像我这样品味独特的人。

original: Delicious.
translation: 好吃。

original: Deliver 100 chunks of meat to Forest Snakes trapper.
translation: 把100块肉送到森林蛇捕捉器。

original: Deliver 1000 marijuana seeds.
translation: 送1000颗大麻种子。

original: Deliver 15 sacks of commercial fertilizer.
translation: 运送15袋商品肥料。

original: Deliver 250 slime globs.
translation: 提供250个粘液球。

original: Deliver 4 slaves.
translation: 送4个奴隶。

original: Descent to the Refugee Center basement and clean it up.
translation: 降落到难民中心地下室清理干净。

original: Did I say two?  I meant three, of course, hehe.  My memory has become poor lately.
translation: 我是说两个吗？我是说三个，当然了，呵呵。我最近记忆力变差了。

original: Did they bring everything here that at least somehow resembled scientific equipment?  I wouldn't need most of this junk.  Well, it's still better than waiting patiently for my death in that seedy pit…
translation: 他们把所有东西都带到这里来了吗，至少在某种程度上类似于科学设备？我不需要这些垃圾。好吧，总比在那肮脏的坑里耐心等待我的死好…

original: Did you bring my men?
translation: 你带我的人来了吗？

original: Did you bring them here, partner?
translation: 你带他们来了吗，伙计？

original: Did you find her?
translation: 你找到她了吗？

original: Did you find it?
translation: 你找到了吗？

original: Did you find them?
translation: 你找到他们了吗？

original: Did you meet with her?
translation: 你见过她吗？

original: Didn't your mom teach you to get involved in other people's conversations?
translation: 你妈妈没教你参与别人的谈话吗？

original: Do a shopping tour of the neighboring town, he-he.
translation: 他到邻近的城镇去逛街。

original: Do it, or get the hell out.  Consider this as advice.
translation: 去做，否则就滚出去。把这当作建议。

original: Do you know a guy named Barrett Hartley?
translation: 你认识一个叫巴雷特·哈特利的人吗？

original: Do you need any help?
translation: 你需要帮助吗？

original: Do you now how to work with bionics?
translation: 你现在知道如何使用仿生学了吗？

original: Do you really want to help me?  Then listen.  The representative assigned me and another <name_g> to check one of the possible Hell Riders' caches.  My partner has disappeared somewhere, but I don't want to go alone.  Can you keep me company and cover my back while I carry out my task?
translation: 你真的想帮我吗？那就听我说。代表派我和另一个<name_g>去检查一个可能的地狱骑士的藏匿处。我的搭档不见了，但我不想一个人去。我执行任务时，你能陪着我吗？

original: Do you really want to help?  Then you must prepare well.  As soon as I open the way, they will not wait long and will immediately come out.
translation: 你真的想帮忙吗？那你必须做好准备。我一开道，他们就等不了多久，马上就出来。

original: Do you want to follow me?
translation: 你想跟着我吗？

original: Doc, what did you do to me?  I've become an abomination!
translation: 医生，你对我做了什么？我成了一个可憎的人！

original: Don't angry me, stranger.
translation: 别生我的气，陌生人。

original: Don't be in a hurry.  These rats are so closed that they can't get out of there without outside interference.
translation: 别着急。这些老鼠太封闭了，没有外界的干扰它们是出不去的。

original: Don't delay it.
translation: 别耽搁了。

original: Don't eat them.
translation: 别吃了。

original: Don't laugh at me, <name_b>!
translation: 别笑我，<name_b>！

original: Don't lose my men or you'll be sorry.
translation: 别失去我的人，否则你会后悔的。

original: Don't make any trouble and you'll be fine.
translation: 别惹麻烦，你会没事的。

original: Don't worry, I know how to fix it.  I just need to find more berries…
translation: 别担心，我知道怎么修。我只想多找些浆果…

original: Don't worry, the Old Guard will take care of her.  We do not abandon our own people, even those who didn't officially join our ranks.
translation: 别担心，老警卫会照顾她的。我们不会抛弃自己的人民，即使是那些没有正式加入我们队伍的人。

original: Don't worry, we're getting there soon.
translation: 别担心，我们很快就到了。

original: Don't worry. I'll lead you somewhere safe. To evac center.
translation: 别担心。我带你去安全的地方。去疏散中心。

original: Drowned baggage
translation: 溺水行李

original: Electric Jackhammer.
translation: 电钻。

original: End Flame Knuckle!
translation: 结束火焰指节！

original: Evac center
translation: 疏散中心

original: Evac shelter
translation: 疏散避难所

original: Everything is ready, <name_g>.  I was able to get close enough to them, now there was only one small step.  The problem is that as soon as I open the passage, they will pour out of there like ants from their hive.  It would be nice to put a few guys here so that they shoot them, but for some reason no one agreed.  Now I sit here, waiting for some miracle.
translation: 一切都准备好了，<name_g>。我能够接近他们，现在只有一小步。问题是，我一打开通道，它们就会像蚂蚁一样从蜂巢里涌出来。把几个人放在这里，这样他们就可以开枪了，但由于某些原因，没有人同意。现在我坐在这里，等待奇迹。

original: Excellent choice, hunter.
translation: 不错的选择，亨特。

original: Excellent.  If he agreed on everything, then we will have to deliver at least a dozen workers.
translation: 杰出的。如果他什么都同意的话，那么我们至少得派一打工人来。

original: Experimental serum
translation: 实验血清

original: FINE, take another one!
translation: 好吧，再来一个！

original: Farm is burned, so I don't have anything to do around here.  I'm just passing time gambling and drinking.
translation: 农场被烧毁了，所以我在这附近没什么事可做。我只是在消磨时间赌博喝酒。

original: Finally. I will periodically need to send packages, so if interested, I can offer you more similar work.
translation: 最后。我会定期需要发送包，所以如果有兴趣，我可以提供给你更多类似的工作。

original: Find 150 rolls of barbed wire fors Forest Snakes recruiter.
translation: 为森林蛇招募者找到150卷带刺铁丝网。

original: Find ai_module_advanced 10
translation: 查找ai\模块\高级10

original: Find ai_module_basic 20
translation: 查找ai模块\U basic 20

original: Find anything?
translation: 找到什么了吗？

original: Find batteries for the meteorologist
translation: 给气象学家找电池

original: Find briefcase somewhere in the wrecked ship.
translation: 在失事船的某处找到公文包。

original: Find crashed drone
translation: 找到坠毁的无人机

original: Find daughter
translation: 找女儿

original: Find laptop 1
translation: 查找笔记本电脑1

original: Find lens_small 5
translation: 查找镜头大小5

original: Find minireactor 1
translation: 找到微型反应堆1

original: Find plutonium cell 20
translation: 找到钚电池20

original: Find radiocontrol
translation: 查找无线电控制

original: Find scrap for the meteorologist
translation: 给气象学家找些废品

original: Fine, I don't have time for this.  Now get out.
translation: 好吧，我没时间。现在出去。

original: Fine, I'll ask someone else.
translation: 好吧，我去问问别人。

original: Fine, I'll try make something."  she left and returned after five minutes.  "Here, take it.
translation: “好吧，我试着做点什么。”她离开了，五分钟后又回来了来，拿着。

original: Fine.  Let's start with a little test.  Hunt down 25 animals.  It doesn't matter what kind.  Choose the method at your discretion.
translation: 好的。让我们从一个小测试开始。猎杀25只动物。不管是什么样的。你可以自由选择方法。

original: Finish your business with those chicks and talk to me.  Until then, let's pretend that we don't know each other.
translation: 把你和那些小妞的事做完，跟我谈谈。在那之前，让我们假装不认识对方。

original: First OG task
translation: 第一个OG任务

original: Follow me, I'll lead you to your dad.
translation: 跟我来，我带你去找你爸爸。

original: Follow me.
translation: 跟着我。

original: For my work I need my old lab notes.  Can you find them for me?
translation: 为了我的工作，我需要我的旧实验笔记。你能帮我找到吗？

original: Forest Snakes
translation: 森林蛇

original: Forest Snakes sounds cool!  If you are sure about it, lead me to their leader, so he can accept me.
translation: 森林蛇听起来很酷！如果你确定的话，带我去见他们的首领，这样他就可以接受我了。

original: Forest Snakes.
translation: 森林蛇。

original: Forest camp
translation: 森林营地

original: Forgive me, wanderer, but even such merits will not help you in joining my pack.  However, you can take advantage of my hospitality.  Welcome to my abode, wanderer.
translation: 原谅我，流浪者，但即使这样的功绩也无助于你加入我的队伍。不过，你可以利用我的好客。欢迎来到我的住处，流浪者。

original: Freedom is near, I can feel it.
translation: 自由就在眼前，我能感觉到。

original: Gas them, gas them all!
translation: 加油，加油！

original: Get bent, traitor!
translation: 趴下，叛徒！

original: Get lost, <name_b>.
translation: 迷路，<name_b>。

original: Give me a break, <name_g>, why would we.  Besides, she would be useful to us more than to that <swear> ape.
translation: 饶了我吧，<name_g>，我们为什么要这么做。此外，她对我们的帮助比对那只<swear>猿更大。

original: Give me one of your females.
translation: 给我一个你的女人。

original: Go and bring me this, person.  We'll arrange place for they to work in the back room.
translation: 去把这个给我，伙计。我们会安排他们在后面的房间工作。

original: Go.
translation: 去吧。

original: Good choice.
translation: 不错的选择。

original: Good day to you, sister.
translation: 你好，姐姐。

original: Good job!  Here, take this as payment.
translation: 干得好！给，把这个当作付款。

original: Good to hear.
translation: 很高兴听到你这么说。

original: Good work, <name_g>.  I will make it worth your while.
translation: 干得好，<name_g>。我会让你觉得值得的。

original: Good, let's <swear> break out of here."  he grabbed a bunch of sheets sewed together, and covered the bars with them.  After that, he took a little metal pipe and opened a secret hole in floor with it.  "That's our way to freedom, <name_g>.  Let's go.  You first.
translation: 好，我们<swear>逃出去。”他抓起一堆缝在一起的被单，用它们盖住了栅栏。之后，他拿起一根小金属管，用它在地板上开了一个秘密的洞。”那是我们通往自由的路，<name_g>。走吧。你先。

original: Good, let's continue with generator. Find minireactor 1
translation: 好，让我们继续发电机。找到微型反应堆1

original: Good, the serum is ready.  Shall we try it?
translation: 很好，血清准备好了。我们可以试试吗？

original: Good.
translation: 很好。

original: Good.  First, I want to study how the virus affected cute little animals like spiders.  Perhaps you saw what happened to them.  A terrible sight.  Bring me 15 spider eggs.
translation: 很好。首先，我想研究病毒是如何影响像蜘蛛这样可爱的小动物的。也许你看到了他们的遭遇。可怕的景象。给我15个蜘蛛蛋。

original:
Good.  Here's a package for you, take it to the…"  suddenly, the front door of the center opened loudly and some guy flew into.  After catching his breath, he said:  

Thug: "Hey, there's some <name_b>'s moving here on pickup trucks, armed to the teeth.  Get the guys together while there is time, otherwise they will shoot us one by one!"

Mister T, shady dealer: "Delivery is canceled.  Urgently grab what you have and run out to shoot these dogs.
translation:
很好。这是给你的包裹，拿去……”突然，中心前门大开，有人飞了进来。喘了口气，他说：

暴徒：“嘿，<name_b>骑着皮卡车，全副武装，在这里移动。有时间的时候把他们召集起来，否则他们会一个接一个地向我们开枪！”

original: Good.  I just need a little stuff: 50 scrap, 6 medium batteries, 5 small high-quality lenses and a radio remote control.  Bring the scrap for now, but don't forget about the rest.
translation: 很好。我只需要一点东西：50块废电池，6个中型电池，5个小的高质量镜头和一个无线电遥控器。暂时把废品拿来，但别忘了剩下的。

original: Good.  Let me talk to someone in charge.  Maybe they'll let us in.
translation: 很好。让我和负责人谈谈。也许他们会让我们进去。

original: Good.  Let's go to his house and <swear> burn it down!  Oh, by the way, could you bring gasoline with you, <name_g>?  I was so angry I forgot to bring it with me…
translation: 很好。我们去他家<swear>烧了吧！哦，顺便问一下，你能带上汽油吗，<name_g>？气得忘记带了…

original: Good.  Prove it.  We captured urban rat of so called 'Free merchants' that tried to took what is OURS.  In OUR territory!  Kill him, then we can talk about you.
translation: 很好。证明一下。我们抓住了所谓的“自由商人”的城市老鼠，他们试图夺走我们的东西。在我们的领土上！杀了他，我们就可以谈你了。

original: Good.  So the first thing we need to do is find the seeds.  Bring at least 2kg of cannabis seeds.  I will try to find some more through my channels.  The sooner we plant the seeds, the faster we will get the harvest.
translation: 很好。所以我们要做的第一件事就是找到种子。至少带2公斤大麻籽。我会通过我的渠道找到更多的。我们越早播种，收获就越快。

original: Good.  This time, I want to study how the virus affected cute animals like bees.  These critters have mutated into real flying and buzzing killers!  A terrible sight.  Bring me 5 royal jelly.
translation: 很好。这次，我想研究病毒是如何影响像蜜蜂这样可爱的动物的。这些生物已经变异成真正的飞行和嗡嗡声杀手！可怕的景象。给我5个蜂王浆。

original: Good.  This time, I want to study how the virus affected cute animals like razorclaw.  These creatures have mutated into real death machines!  A terrible sight.  Bring me 8 razorclaw roe.
translation: 很好。这一次，我想研究病毒是如何影响像razorclaw这样的可爱动物的。这些生物已经变异成了真正的死亡机器！可怕的景象。给我拿8把剃刀。

original: Good.  Wait here for some time.  It will take no more than a day.
translation: 很好。在这儿等一会儿。不超过一天。

original: Good. Grab the package and go.  By the way, he ordered it some time ago, and I'm not sure if he's still waiting for it.  Well, you're a clever pal, right?  You'll find a way to deliver it.
translation: 很好。拿着包裹走。顺便说一下，他前段时间点的，我不确定他是否还在等。你是个聪明的朋友，对吧？你会找到办法的。

original: Good. I'll be behing you.
translation: 很好。我在后面等你。

original: Good. I'll wait for you.
translation: 很好。我会等你。

original: Good. So, now we have… what was that?! Robots attacking our base? SAVE ME PLEASE! KILL THOSE ROBOTS!
translation: 很好。那么，现在我们有了…那是什么？！机器人攻击我们的基地？请救救我！杀了那些机器人！

original: Good. Super. Now we need to launch this thing. Talk to me if you want to be here when it happens.
translation: 很好。超级的。现在我们需要启动这个东西。如果你想在这里的话跟我谈谈。

original: Good. Take this pet robot.
translation: 很好。带上这个宠物机器人。

original: Good. Talk to my fellow scientist, help him with his task.
translation: 很好。和我的科学家同伴谈谈，帮他完成任务。

original: Good. This time, I want to study how the virus affected cute animals like ants.  Perhaps you saw what happened to them.  These poor hard workers have mutated into terrible creatures: the size of a car, blade-paws, chitinous armor, and some also know how to spit fire!  A terrible sight.  Bring me 20 ant eggs.
translation: 很好。这次，我想研究病毒是如何影响像蚂蚁这样可爱的动物的。也许你看到了他们的遭遇。这些可怜的勤劳的工人已经变异成可怕的生物：汽车大小，刀爪，几丁质盔甲，还有一些还懂得吐火！可怕的景象。给我20个蚂蚁蛋。

original: Good. You saved me. Thank you! Now I can help you with stuff.
translation: 很好。你救了我。谢谢您！现在我可以帮你了。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Got it.
translation: 知道了。

original: Got payment with you?
translation: 你有付款吗？

original: Gotta go, sorry…
translation: 我得走了，对不起…

original: Great, I'm continue to work on it…
translation: 太好了，我会继续努力的…

original: Great, I'm starting to work on it…
translation: 太好了，我正在努力…

original: Great, very little work left.  I need a few days to finish all this, and to try it in work.  I hope everything will work fine!  While I'm working on the drone, you can read this book.  Maybe you can learn something new from it.
translation: 太好了，只剩下很少的工作了。我需要几天来完成这一切，并在工作中尝试。希望一切顺利！我在做无人机的时候，你可以读这本书。也许你可以从中学到一些新东西。

original: Grim Sisters
translation: 冷酷的姐妹

original: Guess I have no choice, huh?  Fine, I'll comply.
translation: 看来我别无选择，哈？好吧，我会遵守的。

original: Ha!  I like your style.  A little sloppy, but it works.  Consider yourself a friend of the snakes.
translation: 哈！我喜欢你的风格。有点邋遢，但很管用。把自己当成蛇的朋友。

original: Ha!  You alright.  I like the way you talk, stranger.  I have some work that has to be done.  Deal with your babysitting and come back to me, so we could discuss our business.
translation: 哈！你没事吧。我喜欢你说话的方式，陌生人。我有一些工作要做。处理好你的保姆，然后回来找我，这样我们就可以讨论我们的生意了。

original: Ha-ha-ha, you did well, wanderer.  I'll reward you well, in time.  For now, you can help that, person in starting projects for us.
translation: 哈哈哈，你干得不错，流浪汉。我会及时好好奖励你的。现在，你可以帮助这个人为我们启动项目。

original: Hartley Family
translation: 哈特利家族

original: He looks like a nice guy.  Maybe you should not let him die?
translation: 他看起来是个好人。也许你不该让他死？

original: He's dead.
translation: 他死了。

original: He's dead?
translation: 他死了？

original: Hell's Raiders slaves
translation: 地狱掠夺者奴隶

original: Hell's Raiders slaves!
translation: 地狱掠夺者奴隶！

original: Hello there hunter.  I see you are doing a pretty good job of learning hunting craft.  I have prepared another important test for you.  Are you ready for it, hunter?
translation: 你好，亨特。我看你在学习狩猎技艺方面做得很好。我为你准备了另一个重要的测试。你准备好了吗，亨特？

original: Hello there hunter.  I see you are doing a pretty good job of learning hunting craft.  I have prepared another little test for you.  Are you ready for it, hunter?
translation: 你好，亨特。我看你在学习狩猎技艺方面做得很好。我为你准备了另一个小测试。你准备好了吗，亨特？

original: Hello there hunter.  Would you like to hunt some more?  I have discovered the lair of another rare beast, and I can tell you where it is.
translation: 你好，亨特。你想再去打猎吗？我发现了另一种稀有动物的巢穴，我可以告诉你它在哪里。

original: Hello there, boss.
translation: 你好，老板。

original: Hello there.
translation: 你好。

original: Hello.
translation: 你好。

original: Hello.  You are on my territory.  Show me respect or leave this place with new holes in your body.
translation: 你好。你在我的地盘上。尊重我，否则就带着你身上的新洞离开这里。

original: Hello…
translation: 你好…

original: Help Barrett find his daughter and bring her back to him.
translation: 帮巴雷特找到他的女儿，把她带回他身边。

original: Help Barrett with his first Old Guard task.  Lead him to the potential stash of Hell's Raiders and look around for anything suspicious.
translation: 帮助巴雷特完成他的第一个任务。把他带到地狱掠夺者的潜在藏身处，四处寻找可疑的东西。

original: Help Jerry make hotel his new base.  For that, clean it from <zombies>.
translation: 帮助杰瑞把旅馆建成他的新基地。为此，请将其从<zombies>中清除。

original: Help me place 5 transmitters on 5 radio towers.
translation: 帮我把5个发射器放在5个无线电发射塔上。

original: Help my fellow scientist
translation: 帮助我的科学家同伴

original: Help scientist place transmitter
translation: 帮助科学家放置发射器

original: Help?  Help with what?  Oh, yes, yes.  If you know a place with many survivors, can you take me there?  I doubt I can survive alone…
translation: 救命啊？帮什么忙？哦，是的，是的。如果你知道一个有很多幸存者的地方，你能带我去吗？我怀疑我一个人能活下去…

original: Here it is.
translation: 给你。

original: Here you go.
translation: 干得好。

original: Here you go.  I put something special there for you, <sweetie>.
translation: 干得好。我给你放了特别的东西，<sweetie>。

original: Here you go.  We have an eternal lack of hands, so do not hesitate to bring more.
translation: 干得好。我们有一个永恒的手缺乏，所以不要犹豫，带来更多。

original: Here's your RM103A, fresh like from the factory.
translation: 这是你的103A令吉，刚出厂。

original: Here's your RM11B, fresh like from the factory.
translation: 这是您的RM11B，刚出厂的。

original: Here's your RM120c, fresh like from the factory.
translation: 这是你的RM120c，刚出厂的。

original: Here's your RM2000, fresh like from the factory.
translation: 这是你的RM2000，刚出厂的。

original: Here's your RM51, fresh like from the factory.
translation: 这是你的51令吉，刚出厂的那种。

original: Here's your ammo, fresh like from the factory.
translation: 这是你的弹药，刚从工厂运来的。

original: Here's your cards.  Now get to work, <name_b>.
translation: 这是你的名片。现在开始工作吧<name_b>。

original: Here's your cigs.  Now get to work, <name_b>.
translation: 这是你的烟。现在开始工作吧 <name_b>。

original: Here's your cuirass.  Now get to work, <name_b>.
translation: 这是你的胸甲。现在开始工作吧。<name_b>

original: Here's your money for 20x66mm.
translation: 这是你的20x66毫米的钱。

original: Here's your money for 8x40mm.
translation: 这是您的8×40毫米的钱。

original: Here's your money.
translation: 这是你的钱。

original: Here's your syringe.
translation: 这是你的注射器。

original: Here, take it.
translation: 来，拿着。

original: Hey buddy, why would we talk about old stories?  Let's blow something up!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我们为什么要谈论老故事？我们把东西炸了吧！

original: Hey, <name_g>.  Forest Snakes is alright.  There are a lot of cool people here.  What's up?
translation: 嘿，<name_g>。森林蛇没问题。这里有很多很酷的人。怎么了？

original: Hey, <name_g>.  Jerry's squad is alright.  There are a lot of cool people here.  What's up?
translation: 嘿，<name_g>。杰瑞的小队没事。这里有很多很酷的人。怎么了？

original: Hey, I heard everything!
translation: 嘿，我什么都听到了！

original: Hey, Jerry is dead.  Want to travel with me?
translation: 嘿，杰瑞死了。想和我一起旅行吗？

original: Hey, nice armor, <name_g>.  I'll get to it right away.
translation: 嘿，漂亮的盔甲 <name_g>。我马上去。

original: Hey, nice deck of cards, <name_g>.  I'll get to it right away.
translation: 嘿，一副漂亮的牌 <name_g>。我马上去。

original: Hey, relax, <name_g>.  Put the gun down, please.
translation: 嘿，放松，<name_g>。请把枪放下。

original: Hey, what about my payment?
translation: 嘿，我的报酬呢？

original: Hey, what are you two whispering about?
translation: 嘿，你们俩在窃窃私语什么？

original: Hi <sweetie>.
translation: 嗨，亲爱的。

original: Hi.
translation: 你好。

original: Hmm, I don't even know how you can help me.  But if you can find a way to solve this problem, I would be grateful.
translation: 嗯，我都不知道你能帮我什么。但如果你能找到解决这个问题的方法，我将不胜感激。

original: Hmm, I see that the drone is not with you.  Maybe at least the memory module remains?  Okay, show it to me… hmm, situation is worse than I expected, much, much worse… I'm not feeling good.  I don't feel safe in this place anymore.  I have to run, run somewhere.  But where to run if these <monster>s are everywhere…
translation: 嗯，我知道那架无人机不在你身边。也许至少内存模块还在？好吧，给我看看…嗯，情况比我预想的更糟，更糟…我感觉不太好。我在这里已经不安全了。我得跑，跑个地方。但是如果这些怪物到处都是，该往哪里跑…

original: Hmm, OK then.
translation: 嗯，那好吧。

original: Hmm, maybe I forgot to add something…
translation: 嗯，也许我忘了加些东西…

original: Hmm, maybe you're right. I'll go with you.
translation: 嗯，也许你是对的。我和你一起去。

original: Hmm, that's how it is.  I think I have an idea.  Now I need to contact Mister T to see what we can agree on.  When you have time, talk to him about it, say that I sent you.  Now go.
translation: 嗯，就是这样。我想我有个主意。现在我需要联系T先生看看我们能达成什么协议。当你有时间的时候，跟他谈谈，说是我派你来的。现在走吧。

original: Hmm, we are full, but… if someone wants to share their ration, you can ask around.
translation: 嗯，我们已经满了，但是…如果有人想分享他们的口粮，你可以四处打听。

original: Hmm.
translation: 隐马尔可夫模型。

original: Hmm… you asked me a question to which I have no answer.  Now I myself am interested.  I'll think about it.
translation: 嗯…你问了我一个我没有答案的问题。现在我自己也很感兴趣。我会考虑的。

original: How are you here?
translation: 你好吗？

original: How are you?
translation: 你好吗？

original: How did you get here?  Sisters, let's punch this little swine until he start squeaking.
translation: 你怎么来的？姐妹们，让我们揍这只小猪直到它开始吱吱叫。

original: How did you get saddled with bandit life?
translation: 你是怎么过上强盗生活的？

original: How do you managed to get caught?
translation: 你是怎么被抓住的？

original: How is it going?
translation: 过得如何？

original: How is the hunt going?
translation: 狩猎进展如何？

original: How is the search going?
translation: 搜索进展如何？

original: How is your work going?
translation: 你的工作进展如何？

original: How smart of you!"  He smiled.  "Even in the world after <the_cataclysm>, the king has remained unchanged - money.  Everyone needs money, and even criminals sometimes have to get it honestly, trading or exchanging it for services.  I am also no exception, and for a few evergreens… hmm, it's time to get out of this.  In general, for anything of value, I am ready to solve your gang relationship problems.
translation: 你真聪明！”他笑了。”即使在大灾变之后的世界上，国王也没有改变——金钱。每个人都需要钱，甚至罪犯有时也必须诚实地得到钱，用钱交易或交换服务。我也不例外，对一些常青队来说……嗯，是时候摆脱这一切了。总的来说，对于任何有价值的事情，我都准备好解决你的帮派关系问题。

original: How's it going?
translation: 怎么样？

original: How’s your search going?
translation: 你的搜索进展如何？

original: Huh, maybe you're right.  I apologize for what I said earlier.
translation: 嗯，也许你是对的。我为我刚才说的话道歉。

original: Huh?  You talking to me?
translation: 呵呵？你在跟我说话？

original: I advise you to search in a store, such as electronics or toy store.
translation: 我建议你在商店里搜索，例如电子产品店或玩具店。

original: I always knew you wouldn't let me down, wanderer.  Too bad you betrayed me, and I don't have another choice.  Too bad I have to lose such valuable, person.
translation: 我就知道你不会让我失望的，流浪者。可惜你背叛了我，我别无选择。可惜我失去了这么有价值的人。

original: I am glad to hear it.  When I'll get in contact with my men, we will begin preparations for the move.
translation: 我很高兴听到这个消息。当我和我的人取得联系后，我们将开始准备行动。

original: I am the neutral side.  Thanks to my skills, I was able to establish contact with the largest of the groups, and even win their favor.
translation: 我是中立的一方。由于我的技能，我能够与最大的团体建立联系，甚至赢得他们的青睐。

original: I am very uncomfortable asking you about this, but… the fact is that my daughter and I were hiding together in the school building.  It was pretty quiet on the upper floors, and there was plenty of supplies in the dining room.  When it was time to leave, in a hurry I forgot to take my daughter's favorite doll, and she was so worried about her that she decided to return for it.  I tried to dissuade her, but she did not obey me that night, and ran to school after her beloved doll.  Please help me get my daughter back!
translation: 问你这件事我很不舒服，但是…事实是我女儿和我一起躲在学校大楼里。楼上很安静，餐厅里有很多用品。到了该走的时候，匆忙中我忘了带我女儿最喜欢的洋娃娃，她很担心她，所以决定回来拿。我试图劝阻她，但她那天晚上不听我的话，跟着她心爱的洋娃娃跑去上学。请帮我找回我的女儿！

original: I brought you a package.
translation: 我给你带了个包裹。

original: I came from Azerbaijan to build robots-desu, and to launch Cloudnet so I can reprogram all remain robots to clean our <very> great country from this <zombies>
translation: 我从阿塞拜疆来建造机器人desu，并发射Cloudnet，这样我就可以重新编程所有剩余的机器人来清除我们<very>国家的 <zombies>

original: I can help you with that, if you want.
translation: 如果你愿意，我可以帮你。

original: I can make special serum that may give you animal strength!  Do you want to be my test subject, <name_g>?
translation: 我可以制造特殊的血清，可以给你动物的力量！你想成为我的测试对象吗？<name_g>

original: I can smell the blood on you.  Blood that flowed between these walls.  Tell me, are you the reaper who sprinkled this place with the lives of the innocent?
translation: 我能闻到你身上的血。血在这些墙之间流动。告诉我，你是把无辜者的生命洒在这里的收割者吗？

original: I can try.
translation: 我可以试试。

original: I changed my mind.  Nothing personal, kid.
translation: 我改变主意了。没什么私事，孩子。

original: I don't believe any of your lies!  Die, liar!
translation: 我不相信你的任何谎言！死吧，骗子！

original: I don't care about your lies.  You will die tonight, <name_b>.
translation: 我不在乎你的谎言。你今晚就要死了。<name_b>

original: I don't have anything for you right now, wanderer.
translation: 我现在没有东西给你，流浪者。

original: I don't have much to say, sorry.
translation: 我没什么好说的，对不起。

original: I don't have time for talking, <name_b>.
translation: 我没时间说话。<name_b>

original: I don't have time for talking, wanderer.
translation: 我没时间说话，流浪汉。

original: I don't have time for this.  *use force*
translation: 我没时间做这个。*使用武力*

original: I don't know quite what happened.  Maybe something noticed my drone and tried to bring it down.  Be careful.
translation: 我不太清楚发生了什么事。也许有什么东西注意到了我的无人机，想把它弄下来。小心。

original: I don't know what to teach you, but take this. Don't know what it is, and I can't remember where I found it.
translation: 我不知道该教你什么，但是拿着这个。我不知道是什么，也不记得在哪儿找到的。

original: I don't know what you are talking about, honestly, <name_g>.
translation: 老实说，我不知道你在说什么。<name_g>

original: I don't like it here…
translation: 我不喜欢这里…

original: I don't like people like you.
translation: 我不喜欢像你这样的人。

original: I don't like your <swear> face, <name_b>.
translation: 我不喜欢你的<swear>脸。 <name_b>

original: I don't quite trust you yet, <name_g>.  Show yourself better, then we'll talk.
translation: 我还不太相信你，<name_g>。好好表现一下，然后我们再谈。

original: I don't think this is a difficult task.  Surely there is a lot of it underfoot.
translation: 我认为这不是一项困难的任务。当然，这里面有很多。

original: I don't want to talk about it, please…
translation: 我不想谈这个，拜托…

original: I don't want to talk about that…
translation: 我不想谈那个…

original: I found a human finger inside my foodpack.  What did you gave me exactly?
translation: 我在我的食物袋里发现了一个人类的手指。你到底给了我什么？

original: I have a small supply of materials here that these thugs brought along, so you can take your time.
translation: 我这里有一小部分材料是这些暴徒带来的，所以你可以慢慢来。

original: I have not seen living people for a long time.  Glad to see another survivor.  Greetings, <name_g>.
translation: 我好久没见到活人了。很高兴看到另一个幸存者。你好，<name_g>。

original: I haven't met a suitable beast yet.  Come and see me later.
translation: 我还没有遇到合适的野兽。晚点来看我。

original: I honestly don't know what you're talking about.
translation: 我真的不知道你在说什么。

original: I hope it helps…
translation: 我希望这有帮助…

original: I hope my notes is still intact.
translation: 我希望我的笔记还完好无损。

original: I hope so…
translation: 希望如此…

original: I hope you get bring me some good news, <name_g>.
translation: 希望你能给我带来好消息，<name_g>。

original: I hope you're not leading me to certain death…
translation: 我希望你不会把我引向死亡…

original: I just talked to the guys from the Red Suns.  They don't really like their leader.  Any thoughts on this?
translation: 我刚和红太阳队的人谈过。他们不太喜欢他们的领导。有什么想法吗？

original: I just wanted to get as close to you as possible to kill you all by looking you in the eyes.
translation: 我只是想尽可能靠近你，看着你的眼睛杀了你们所有人。

original: I learned everything I wanted.  Get bent, traitor!
translation: 我学到了我想要的一切。趴下，叛徒！

original: I like your attitude.
translation: 我喜欢你的态度。

original: I lost my wife, my mother, my father, my friends and now… my daughter is… I don't want to live anymore…
translation: 我失去了我的妻子，我的母亲，我的父亲，我的朋友，现在…我的女儿…我不想再活下去了…

original: I need help removing an implant.
translation: 我需要帮助移除植入物。

original: I need more research materials for my work.  Bring me 250 slime glob.
translation: 我的工作需要更多的研究材料。给我250个粘液球。

original: I need more time, <name_g>.  Come back later.
translation: 我需要更多的时间，<name_g>。晚点再来。

original: I need more time.
translation: 我需要更多的时间。

original: I need more time.  Come back later.
translation: 我需要更多的时间。晚点再来。

original: I need more time.  Its harder than I initially thought.
translation: 我需要更多的时间。比我最初想象的要难。

original: I need some time to prepare.
translation: 我需要一些时间来准备。

original: I need some time to prepare.  Wait here.
translation: 我需要一些时间来准备。在这里等着。

original: I need to lit up this place, and for that I need generator. For starters, find me plutonium cell 20.
translation: 我需要点亮这个地方，为此我需要发电机。首先，给我找20号钚电池。

original: I need you to return to that refugee center and bring back my <name_g>.
translation: 我需要你回到那个难民中心把我的<name_g>带回来。

original: I saved your man here, and he said there was a reward for it.
translation: 我在这里救了你的人，他说有报酬。

original: I see my lessons haven't gone to waste for you, <name_g>.  Having defeated such a beast, you have earned the title of the first hunter in this state!  After me, of course, hehe.  You will receive a double reward, as well as my old rifle.  She served me faithfully for a long time, but the time has come to hand her over to you.  Treat her well, okay?  Oh yeah, if you want to hunt down some more rare beast, I can leave some for you if you want.
translation: 我看我的功课对你来说没有白费，<name_g>。打败了这样一头野兽，你赢得了这个州第一个猎人的称号！当然，在我之后，呵呵。你会得到双倍的奖励，还有我的旧步枪。她忠实地为我服务了很长时间，但现在是把她交给你的时候了。好好对待她，好吗？哦，是的，如果你想猎杀一些更稀有的野兽，如果你想的话，我可以留一些给你。

original: I should probably get going.
translation: 我该走了。

original: I talked to your leader.  He ordered your extraction.
translation: 我和你的领导谈过了。他命令你撤离。

original: I think that…
translation: 我认为…

original: I think this…
translation: 我想这个…

original: I think we should avoid this shelter.
translation: 我想我们应该避开这个庇护所。

original: I think you know perfectly well that you are the informant.  There is no point in trying to hide it.
translation: 我想你很清楚你是线人。想把它藏起来是没有意义的。

original: I told you, none of your <swear> business, <name_b>!
translation: 我告诉过你，<swear>不关你的事，<name_b>！

original: I tried to talk to them, but they refused to let us in.  Maybe you can try?
translation: 我想和他们谈谈，但他们不让我们进去。也许你可以试试？

original: I want to expand my little crew.  Bring me new men, that would die for me.  I'm good with at least two.
translation: 我想扩大我的小团队。给我带来新的男人，他们会为我而死。我至少有两个。

original: I want to make my own narc farm to make money.  I have some seed supply, but this is not enough to fully develop it.  I can't do it myself, and I need a partner.  Do you want to become my partner?  If you help me with the development of the farm, we will divide the profit 50 by 50.
translation: 我想自己搞个毒品农场赚钱。我有一些种子供应，但这不足以充分发展它。我自己做不到，我需要一个搭档。你想成为我的搭档吗？如果你帮我发展农场，我们将把利润分成50乘50。

original: I want to talk about workforce for the farm…
translation: 我想谈谈农场的劳动力…

original: I want you to use this item.
translation: 我要你用这个东西。

original: I was a chemist before <the_cataclysm>.  Now I'm making drugs for Sunset Bikers.  Hell Yeah!
translation: 我在大灾变之前是个化学家。现在我在为日落骑自行车的人做毒品。见鬼，耶！

original: I was studying animals my whole life, until <the_cataclysm> came right to my home. I managed to run away and hide in the woods, until I found that lovely shelter, where I continued to study animals.
translation: 我一生都在研究动物，直到大灾变来到我家。我设法逃走，躲在树林里，直到我找到了那个可爱的庇护所，在那里我继续研究动物。

original: I was wondering if you could install a cybernetic implant.
translation: 我想知道你能否安装一个控制植入物。

original: I will try to find some more through my channels.  The earlier we plant seeds, the faster we get the harvest.
translation: 我会通过我的渠道找到更多的。我们越早播种，收获就越快。

original: I worked on a large pharmaceutic corporation, I was studying animals my whole life, until <the_cataclysm> came right to my home.  I managed to run away and hide in the woods, until I found this lovely shelter, where I could work in piece.
translation: 我在一家大型制药公司工作，我一生都在研究动物，直到灾难降临我家。我设法逃走，躲在树林里，直到我找到了这个可爱的庇护所，在那里我可以一块一块地工作。

original: I would like to ask you about something…
translation: 我想问你一件事…

original: I would like to see how you do it."  He chuckled.  "Now let's get serious.  I wasn't joking about chains and meat.  The percentage of sane is too small, and without a good relationship with the leader, your meeting with a gang member will end sooner than you have time to notice.  Consider this friendly advice.
translation: “我想看看你是怎么做的。”他笑着说现在让我们认真点。我不是在拿锁链和肉开玩笑。理智的百分比太小了，如果没有与头目的良好关系，你与帮派成员的会面会在你有时间注意到之前结束。考虑一下这个友好的建议。

original: I', still thinking, <name_g>.  Give me some time.
translation: 我还在想。<name_g> 给我点时间。

original: I'd rather not.  I don't want to lose my head, <name_g>.
translation: 我宁愿不要。我不想失去理智，<name_g>。

original: I'll ask her.
translation: 我会问她的。

original: I'll choose money.
translation: 我会选择钱。

original: I'll see what I can do.
translation: 我看看我能做些什么。

original: I'll tell you a secret, we don't really like him here.  He's mad!  He often has psychoses, during which he begins to pounce on everyone around.  During a recent psychosis, he just turned one of our guys into a bloody mess.  Poor guy… the old leader was many times better than this psycho.
translation: 我告诉你一个秘密，我们不太喜欢他。他疯了！他经常有精神病，在这期间他开始攻击周围的每一个人。在最近的一次精神病发作中，他把我们的一个手下搞得一团糟。可怜的家伙…老领导比这个神经病好多倍了。

original: I'll think about it.
translation: 我会考虑的。

original: I'll wait.
translation: 我会等的。

original: I'm bored.  I need to collect supplies for winter and I don't feel like it.  Listen, don't you want to learn how to hunt?  I can help you with this if you help me.  What do you say?
translation: 我很无聊。我需要收集冬季用品，但我不喜欢。听着，你不想学打猎吗？如果你帮我，我可以帮你。你怎么说？

original: I'm busy.  Let's talk some other time.
translation: 我很忙。我们改天再谈吧。

original: I'm busy.  Talk to me later.
translation: 我很忙。晚点再跟我说。

original: I'm cooking food for our boys, and for those bitches.
translation: 我在为我们的孩子和那些婊子做饭。

original: I'm currently busy with something. Come back later.
translation: 我现在有点忙。晚点再来。

original: I'm done here. Let's get going.
translation: 我受够了。我们走吧。

original: I'm fine, thank you for not forgetting about me…
translation: 我很好，谢谢你没有忘记我…

original: I'm fine, thank you.  Everything is going well, <name_g>.  The people here are good, there is always some work available: sometimes I help to distribute the brought habar, there is always a need to repair the barriers, and sometimes they are put me in post when there are no extra hands.  I even managed to join the Old Guard, can you imagine?  Well, almost.  It will only be necessary to fulfill their simple task, and I'll be considered as full member!  There will be a salary, and rations will be enough for the two of us.
translation: 我很好，谢谢。一切都很顺利，<name_g>。这里的人很好，总是有一些工作可以做：有时我帮忙分发带来的哈巴，总是需要修理障碍，有时他们在没有多余人手的情况下把我安排在岗位上。你能想象吗，我甚至还加入了老卫兵？嗯，差不多了。只需要完成他们的简单任务，我就被视为正式会员了！会有薪水，口粮够我们两个人吃。

original: I'm fine, thank you. It's a little cramped here, but we can handle it.  The main thing is that it's safe here and at least we have some food for ourselves. They don't feed here for free, tough, but there is enough work for guys like me, so I'm not complaining.
translation: 我很好，谢谢。这里有点挤，但我们能应付。最重要的是这里很安全，至少我们有自己的食物。他们不是免费的，很辛苦，但是像我这样的人有足够的工作，所以我没有抱怨。

original: I'm from Comandante.  Did you agree on something?
translation: 我是康斯坦特的。你同意什么了吗？

original: I'm glad it's all over.
translation: 我很高兴一切都结束了。

original: I'm glad that you are alive and that you haven't forgot about me.  The drone turned out to be great, it managed to take off and even was able to fly several hundred meters!  Unfortunately, after that, I lost control of it… I don't know what happened to it, though.  Maybe you can check?  I'm a little afraid to go out there…
translation: 我很高兴你还活着，你没有忘记我。这架无人机原来很棒，它成功起飞，甚至能飞几百米！不幸的是，在那之后，我失去了控制…我不知道发生了什么。也许你可以查一下？我有点害怕出去…

original: I'm glad to hear that.  Here are the coordinates of this place, where you will meet your prey.  Good luck!
translation: 听到这个我很高兴。这是这个地方的坐标，在那里你会遇到你的猎物。祝你好运！

original: I'm glad to hear that.  Listen carefully.  During one of my last hunt, I discovered something very interesting - the Shakalaka cave!  What, you have never heard of the legendary Shakalaka?  This is truly a terrible beast, <name_g>.  People said that he looks like a bear, but with three heads… I'm not deceiving you!  In short, go and hunt this beast and do not return until you hunt him down.
translation: 听到这个我很高兴。仔细听。在我上次的一次狩猎中，我发现了一个非常有趣的东西——沙卡拉卡洞穴！什么，你从来没有听说过传说中的夏卡拉卡？这真是一头可怕的野兽 <name_g>。人们说他长得像只熊，但是有三个头…我没有骗你！简言之，去猎杀这只野兽，在你猎杀它之前不要回来。

original: I'm glad you share our tastes, <sweetie>.  Do you want some more?
translation: 我很高兴你能分享我们的品味，<sweetie>。你还要吗？

original: I'm glad you still alive.
translation: 我很高兴你还活着。

original: I'm glad you're OK.
translation: 我很高兴你没事。

original: I'm glad you're in.  Here's the deal: first, we need to distract those chicks that guards this wing, then, we run.  Find a way to deal with them.
translation: 我很高兴你能来。事情是这样的：首先，我们需要转移那些保护翅膀的小鸡的注意力，然后，我们就跑。想办法对付他们。

original: I'm here for the reward.
translation: 我是来领奖的。

original: I'm just a regular meteorologist.  In recent years I have worked at a weather station, monitored the weather, state of air, read and wrote reports, drew up schedules… in general, complete boredom.  In my free time I was studying electronics and radio engineering, making various devices, some for work, some just for fun.  When the first riots began, I gathered all my things that I managed to take with me and settled here.  Since then I've been sitting here, wasting my time doing all sorts of nonsense.
translation: 我只是个普通的气象学家。最近几年我在一个气象站工作，监测天气，空气状况，读写报告，制定时间表……总的来说，完全无聊。空闲时间我学习电子和无线电工程，制造各种各样的设备，有些是为了工作，有些只是为了好玩。当第一次暴乱开始时，我把所有的东西都收集起来，设法随身携带，在这里安顿下来。从那以后，我一直坐在这里，浪费时间做各种各样的废话。

original: I'm just traveling, I didn't meant to disturb you.
translation: 我只是在旅行，我不是故意打扰你的。

original: I'm kinda busy right now.  Come back in a few days.
translation: 我现在有点忙。过几天再来。

original: I'm kinda busy right now.  Maybe next time?
translation: 我现在有点忙。下次吧？

original: I'm not going anywhere without payment.
translation: 我哪也不想不付钱就去。

original: I'm not going anywhere!
translation: 我哪儿也不去！

original: I'm not supposed to talk to slaves.
translation: 我不能和奴隶说话。

original: I'm not sure if I'm saddled with life like this.
translation: 我不确定我是否承受着这样的生活。

original: I'm scared. Where is my dad?
translation: 我很害怕。我爸爸在哪？

original: I'm scared…
translation: 我害怕…

original: I'm so <swear> infuriated!  I've got an enemy that ruined my life, and now I want to get revenge!  I don't care about <the_cataclysm>, I just want to burn his house!  Would you help me, <name_g>?
translation: 我真<swear>被激怒了！我有一个毁了我一生的敌人，现在我要报仇！我不在乎<大灾变>，我只想烧了他的房子！你能帮我吗，<name_g>？

original: I'm sorry for what you…
translation: 我很抱歉你…

original: I'm sorry for your daughter… I failed you…
translation: 我为你女儿难过…我辜负了你…

original: I'm sorry for your father… I failed you…
translation: 对不起你父亲…我辜负了你…

original: I'm sorry, I couldn't bring her alive…
translation: 很抱歉，我不能让她活着…

original: I'm sorry, I couldn't bring them alive…
translation: 很抱歉，我没能让他们活着…

original: I'm sorry, I couldn't get him back alive…
translation: 对不起，我不能让他活着回来…

original: I'm sorry, I couldn't make it in time…
translation: 对不起，我没能及时赶到…

original: I'm sorry, I failed you…
translation: 对不起，我让你失望了…

original: I'm sorry, we still don't have the space, nor the food, to take in more refugees.
translation: 很抱歉，我们仍然没有空间，也没有食物来接纳更多的难民。

original: I'm sorry…
translation: 对不起…

original: I'm struggling to take care of myself here, and I can't take of anyone else.  I'm sorry.
translation: 我在这里努力照顾自己，我不能照顾别人。我很抱歉。

original: I'm tired of walking, <name_g>.
translation: 我厌倦了走路，<name_g>。

original: I'm waiting for you.
translation: 我在等你。

original: I'm waiting, wanderer.
translation: 我在等，流浪者。

original: I'm waiting.
translation: 我在等你。

original: I'm working on it.
translation: 我正在努力。

original: I've been in Refugee Center recently…
translation: 我最近在难民中心…

original: I've been sitting here for a long time, and all that time I was wondering how bad everything is outside.  I want to build a drone that I can use to fly over New England, check the air condition, take a few pictures from above to get a glimpse of how is it.  There were a lot of things in our back room that could be useful, but still I'm missing a lot of things.  You look like an experienced survivalist.  Can you help me?
translation: 我在这里坐了很长时间，一直在想外面的一切有多糟糕。我想造一架无人机，我可以用来飞越新英格兰，检查空气状况，从上面拍几张照片，看看情况如何。我们后面的房间里有很多有用的东西，但我还是错过了很多东西。你看起来像个有经验的生存主义者。你能帮助我吗？

original: I've got only some of them.
translation: 我只有一些。

original: I've got something for you.
translation: 我有东西给你。

original: I've got you some recruits.
translation: 我有一些新兵。

original: I've got your traitor.
translation: 我抓到你的叛徒了。

original: I've had enough of you, begone.
translation: 我受够你了，走开。

original: I've lost the drone, we should find out what happened…
translation: 我把无人机弄丢了，我们应该知道发生了什么…

original: If I want to launch my AI to controll all reamin robots, I need to make myself a control laptop. Find laptop 1
translation: 如果我想启动我的人工智能来控制所有的机器人，我需要做一台控制笔记本电脑。查找笔记本电脑1

original: If you don't budge I'll use force to get what I need.
translation: 如果你不让步，我就用武力得到我需要的东西。

original: Informant extraction
translation: 线人提取

original: Insert text.
translation: 插入文本。

original: Instruments
translation: 仪器

original: Interesting behavior, Mr. Denton.
translation: 有趣的行为，丹顿先生。

original: Interesting interesting.  Well, welcome to my abode, wanderer.
translation: 很有趣。好吧，欢迎来到我的住处，流浪者。

original: Interesting.
translation: 很有趣。

original: Is it safe, <name_g>?
translation: 安全吗？<name_g>

original: Is my daughter alright?  Is she safe?
translation: 我女儿还好吗？她安全吗？

original: Is there any way you can accept my friends over there?
translation: 你能接受我那边的朋友吗？

original: Is there any way you can accept the girl over there?
translation: 你能接受那边那个女孩吗？

original: It tastes… bad, really bad.
translation: 它尝起来…糟透了，真的糟透了。

original: It tastes… nice.  Can I have some more?
translation: 味道…不错。我能再吃点吗？

original: It tastes… weird.  What is it?
translation: 味道…怪怪的。这是怎么一回事？

original: It was WHAT? *puke*
translation: 是什么？*呕吐*

original: It was good, I really liked it.
translation: 很好，我真的很喜欢。

original: It will be done.
translation: 一定会成功的。

original: It's all over, my man.
translation: 一切都结束了，伙计。

original: It's done!  Let's test it?
translation: 完成了！我们来测试一下？

original: It's time to act.  We have been looking closely at this center for quite some time.  It is quite spacious, there are many different supplies, and most importantly, it is full of helpless survivors.  In short, we need to capture this center.  Are you in business?
translation: 是时候行动了。我们仔细观察这个中心已经有一段时间了。它相当宽敞，有许多不同的物资，最重要的是，它充满了无助的幸存者。简而言之，我们需要占领这个中心。你在做生意吗？

original: Jackhammer.
translation: 凿岩机。

original: Jerry asked you to bring him more men for his crew.  At least two will be enough.
translation: 杰瑞让你为他的船员多带些人手。至少两个就够了。

original: Jerry looks like a nice fella.
translation: 杰瑞看起来是个好人。

original: Jerry will hurt you if you lose his men.
translation: 如果你失去他的人杰里会伤害你的。

original: Jerry's Squad
translation: 杰瑞的小队

original: Jerry's squad sounds cool! If you are sure about it, lead me to their leader, so he can accept me.
translation: 杰瑞的队伍听起来很酷！如果你确定的话，带我去见他们的首领，这样他就可以接受我了。

original: Just chatting, <name_g>.  Good old friendly chit-chat.
translation: 只是聊天，<name_g>。友好的闲聊。

original: Just inject it already!
translation: 已经注射了！

original: Just passing by.
translation: 只是路过。

original: Just tell me what need to be done, and I will do it.
translation: 只要告诉我需要做什么，我就去做。

original: Keep me safe please.
translation: 请保护我。

original: Keep the money.  Better take care of the girl, she's left all alone.
translation: 把钱留下。最好照顾好那个女孩，她一个人呆着。

original: Kicking ass without my permission is not allowed!
translation: 未经我的允许不允许踢屁股！

original: Kill 25 wild animals and report back to Forest Snakes trapper.
translation: 杀死25只野生动物，并向森林蛇捕捉者报告。

original: Kill captured scavenger.
translation: 杀死捕获的食腐动物。

original: Lab notes
translation: 实验室笔记

original: Large folder full of different lab notes.
translation: 一个大文件夹，里面装满了不同的实验笔记。

original: Lazy builders
translation: 懒惰的建设者

original: Lead Hartley family to evac center.
translation: 带哈特利一家去疏散中心。

original: Lead Hartley family to evac shelter
translation: 带哈特利一家去避难所

original: Let me get him out of here and finish him off in the forest.  I don't want to get anything dirty here.
translation: 让我把他弄出去，在森林里干掉他。我不想把这里弄脏。

original: Let's do it!
translation: 我们开始吧！

original: Let's go, fast.
translation: 我们走，快点。

original: Let's go.
translation: 我们走吧。

original: Let's play.
translation: 我们来玩吧。

original: Let's start…"  he took a syringe from his pocket.  "Relax, it wouldn't hurt.
translation: 我们开始吧……”他从口袋里拿出一支注射器别紧张，不会疼的。

original: Let's talk later.
translation: 我们晚点再说吧。

original: Let's trade.
translation: 我们交易吧。

original: Listen, <name_g>, even though I did the same thing as now, that life is already in the past.  So let's close this topic and start looking to the future.
translation: 听着，<name_g>，尽管我做了和现在一样的事，但生活已经过去了。所以让我们结束这个话题，开始展望未来。

original: Listen, those berries that I found for you, are they really have healing?
translation: 听着，我为你找到的那些浆果，它们真的有治疗作用吗？

original: Listen, where do you keep these coins?  If I hit you, will they fall out of you like in video games?
translation: 听着，你把这些硬币放哪儿了？如果我打你，他们会像玩电子游戏一样从你身上掉下来吗？

original: Listen, who is that big hairy guy?
translation: 听着，那个毛茸茸的大个子是谁？

original: Listen.  I need a courier to deliver one very important package.  One condition: do not damage the package.  If you can do it, I'll make worth your time.  Agree?
translation: 听。我需要一个快递员送一个非常重要的包裹。一个条件：不要损坏包装。如果你能做到的话，我会让你付出值得的时间。同意吗？

original: Look at a hardware store or similar location.
translation: 看看五金店或类似的地方。

original: Look out!
translation: 留神！

original: Look, <name_g>, I'm planing to breaking out of this place.  Wanna help me with it?
translation: 听着，<name_g>，我正打算离开这里。想帮我吗？

original: Look, certain guys need your knowledge.  Be nice, do as they ask, and you can continue to do your research, or whatever you usually did there before <the_cataclysm>.
translation: 听着，有些人需要你的知识。友善点，按照他们的要求去做，你可以继续做你的研究，或者你以前在那里做过的任何事情。

original: Look, maybe you let him go?
translation: 听着，也许你放了他？

original: Looks like you're right.  Hmm, what is this lying here…" he reached for a piece of paper lying on the ground and took it. "Look, here's written about some kind of refugee center.  Even with a map how to get there.  Maybe we should try our luck there?
translation: 看来你是对的。嗯，这里躺着的是什么……“他伸手去拿地上的一张纸。”听着，这是关于难民中心的报道。即使有地图怎么去那里。也许我们应该在那里碰碰运气？

original: Made a mistake and got caught.  I was in the city nearby, looking around shops, houses, trying to find something of value.  In one of the houses I stayed longer than usual, sat down to rest, began to read a book and fell asleep.  During a nap, I felt some kind of shaking, I open my eyes.  I saw a gun in front of my eyes and feel like someone is tying my hands.  Then a gag in my mouth, a bag on my head and a strong blow to the temple.  I woke up already here, bound and beaten.  You're not with them, are you?  You must help me escape, <name_g>!  I helped the survivors at the nearby refugee center, they will pay you for saving me.  Please…
translation: 犯了个错误被抓住了。我在附近的城市里，到处找商店、房子，试图找到有价值的东西。在其中一所房子里，我比平常呆得久，坐下来休息，开始看书，然后睡着了。午睡时，我感到有些颤抖，我睁开眼睛。我看到眼前有一把枪，感觉好像有人在绑我的手。然后我嘴里塞了一口，头上戴了一个袋子，太阳穴被狠狠地打了一拳。我已经在这里醒来了，被绑着挨打。你不跟他们在一起，是吗？你一定要帮我逃走，<name_g>！我在附近的难民中心帮助幸存者，他们会为你救我而付钱。拜托…

original: Make it fast, I don't have all day to wait for you.
translation: 快点，我没时间等你了。

original: Make it quick, <name_b>.  I don't have time for your mumbling.
translation: 快点，<name_b>。我没时间听你咕哝。

original: Make it quick.  I don't have all day for chit-chat, you know.
translation: 快点。你知道，我没时间闲聊。

original: Maybe I can help you somehow?
translation: 也许我能帮你什么忙？

original: Maybe I can help you with it?
translation: 也许我能帮你？

original: Maybe I can help you with your problem?
translation: 也许我能帮你解决你的问题？

original: Maybe another time…
translation: 也许下次吧…

original: Maybe later.
translation: 也许以后吧。

original: Maybe something can be done?
translation: 也许可以做点什么？

original: Maybe we can find some gasoline at gas station.
translation: 也许我们可以在加油站找到一些汽油。

original: Maybe we can try to do something else. Come with me.
translation: 也许我们可以试着做点别的。跟我来。

original: Maybe you reconsider?
translation: 也许你会重新考虑？

original: Maybe you want to travel with me?
translation: 也许你想和我一起旅行？

original: Me and my guys sailed here by ship from Philly.  The situation there was just disastrous, not like here.  We decided to sail away from there, wherever.  Unfortunately, we ran into a flock of some strange <monster> that damaged our ship, and we had to quickly change our plan.  For a while we just wandered aimlessly, but then we decided to settle in the first shelter we came across.  And here we are.
translation: 我和我的人从费城乘船来这里。那里的情况很糟糕，不像这里。我们决定离开那里，无论在哪里。不幸的是，我们遇到一群奇怪的怪物毁坏了我们的船，我们不得不迅速改变计划。有一段时间，我们只是漫无目的地闲逛，但后来我们决定定居在我们遇到的第一个庇护所。我们到了。

original: Me too.
translation: 我也是。

original: Medieval stuff.
translation: 中世纪的东西。

original: Meet with Grim Sisters leader.
translation: 见见冷酷姐妹的首领。

original: Melee weapons.
translation: 近战武器。

original: More Survivors Stories
translation: 更多幸存者故事

original: Most importantly, do not forget about me when there is a need for services of this kind.  Oh yeah, I almost forgot.  I want to make you a small gift as a sign of my acquaintance.  You will understand when you receive it.  Good luck <name_g>.
translation: 最重要的是，当需要这种服务时，不要忘记我。哦，是的，我差点忘了。我想送给你一件小礼物，以示我的相识。收到后你会明白的。祝你好运 <name_g>。

original: Move along.
translation: 向前走。

original: My guys will show you the exit.  <kill_npc_h>, <name_b>!
translation: 我的人会带你去出口。 <kill_npc_h>, <name_b>!

original: My patience is not unlimited.
translation: 我的耐心不是无限的。

original: Mycus are love, Mycus are life.
translation: 我的心是爱，我的心是生命。

original: Nah, I'm not a looser.
translation: 不，我不是个失败者。

original: Narc farm pt. 1
translation: 毒品农场私人有限公司。1

original: Narc farm pt. 2
translation: 毒品农场私人有限公司。2

original: Narc farm pt. 3
translation: 毒品农场私人有限公司。三

original: Nasty bitch, huh?
translation: 讨厌的婊子，哈？

original: Never mind…
translation: 没关系…

original: Nevermind.
translation: 没有关系。

original: New goons
translation: 新暴徒

original: Nice!
translation: 很好！

original: Nice! You can talk to our AI if you want.
translation: 很好！如果你愿意，你可以和我们的人工智能谈谈。

original: Nice.  All done.  I'll stay here to finish my part of work.  Go back to Jerry.
translation: 不错。全部完成。我会留在这里完成我的工作。回到杰瑞身边。

original: Nice.  Give me a couple of hours, and I'll smoke out those rats.
translation: 不错。再给我几个小时，我就把那些老鼠抽出来。

original: Nice.  Too bad our little farm got burned, though.  Ah, We'll think about it some other time.  It was nice to have a business partner like you.
translation: 不错。可惜我们的小农场被烧了。啊，我们改天再考虑。有你这样的生意伙伴真好。

original: Nickels?  Really?
translation: 镍币？真的？

original: No one really knew that he really existed, but I managed to track down his hideout.  There were rumors in my town that this beast was capable of destroying whole shed with livestock inside in one fell swoop!  So be careful <very>.
translation: 没人知道他真的存在，但我设法找到了他的藏身处。在我的镇子里有传言说这头野兽能一下子摧毁整个棚子，里面有牲畜！所以要小心<very>。

original: No problem, <name_g>.
translation: 没问题，<name_g>。

original: No problem, <name_g>.  Good luck.
translation: 没问题，<name_g>。祝你好运。

original: No problem, <name_g>.  He told us everything how it was.  Now I will ask the guys to give you your reward.
translation: 没问题，<name_g>。他把一切都告诉了我们。现在我要请他们给你报酬。

original: No problem.
translation: 没问题。

original: No time for advice!
translation: 没时间咨询了！

original: No way.
translation: 不可能。

original: No, I don't think so.
translation: 不，我不这么认为。

original: No, my <name_g>. We lost our last chance. All is lost for us, and for me…[*he got his pistol from his pocket*]
translation: 不，我的<name_g>。我们失去了最后的机会。我们失去了一切，我也失去了一切……[*他从口袋里掏出了手枪*]

original: No, you confused me with someone else.
translation: 不，你把我和别人搞混了。

original: None of your business, <name_b>.
translation: 不关你的事，<name_b>。

original: Nope, got the same answer.  Sorry.
translation: 不，得到了同样的答案。对不起的。

original: Nope.
translation: 不。

original: Not an option, <name_g>.  You need to go with me.
translation: 不是选项，<name_g>。你得跟我走。

original: Not yet.
translation: 还没有。

original: Nothing personal, kid.
translation: 没什么私事，孩子。

original: Nothing special to say.  I was just lucky, like all of us.  The moment <the_cataclysm> arrived, I was at home with my family.  My wife turned into a <zombie>, tried to eat our daughter… it was terrible, <name_g>, and I don't want to talk about that.  Let's close this topic, please.
translation: 没什么特别要说的。我很幸运，和我们一样。灾难一到，我就和家人在家。我妻子变成了一个僵尸，试图吃掉我们的女儿…<name_g>太可怕了，我不想谈这个。让我们结束这个话题吧。

original: Nothing, doc.
translation: 没什么，医生。

original: Nothing, really.
translation: 没什么，真的。

original: Now Mister T is in charge.  He is no match for our first leader, but he is the best candidate available.  I hope he doesn't go mad like that jackal before him…
translation: 现在由T先生负责。他不是我们第一任领导人的对手，但他是目前最好的候选人。我希望他不要像他前面的那只豺狼一样发疯…

original: Now get out, I have things to do.
translation: 现在出去，我有事要做。

original: Now we start working on our AI. Find ai_module_basic 20
translation: 现在我们开始研究人工智能。查找ai模块\U basic 20

original: OK, I got it.
translation: 好的，我知道了。

original: OK, I need a day to make it.  Return to me later.
translation: 好吧，我需要一天的时间。待会再来找我。

original: OK, OK, I'll lead you somewhere safe. To evac center.
translation: 好吧，好吧，我带你去安全的地方。去疏散中心。

original: OK, OK.  Follow me then.
translation: 好的，好的。那就跟我来。

original: OK, let's wait for a while.
translation: 好吧，我们等一会儿。

original: Oh man, I want to <swear> burn it so bad…
translation: 哦天啊，我好想<swear>烧啊…

original: Oh no, my daughter…
translation: 哦不，我女儿…

original: Oh yeah, here's another thing…"  you started chatting.  After a while, you smelled smoke.  You decided to look out where the smoke was coming from.  "Oh no, my beautiful crops!  This damn <name_b> decided to screw me up.  Well, we'll figure it out.  Hold these gas grenades and this mask.  Make these bitch children choke!
translation: 哦，是的，还有一件事……“你开始聊天。过了一会儿，你闻到了烟味。你决定看看烟是从哪里冒出来的。”哦，不，我美丽的庄稼！这个该死的<name_b>决定把我搞砸了。好吧，我们会想办法的。拿着这些手榴弹和这个面具。让这些婊子窒息！

original: Oh, <sweetie>, I don't even know if you would like it.  Our tastes are quite, unusual.  But if you really want to try some, I can give you something special.
translation: 哦，<亲爱的>，我都不知道你是否喜欢。我们的口味很特别。但如果你真的想尝尝，我可以给你点特别的。

original: Oh, are you here t-to k-kill me?!  Please don't, please don't!
translation: 哦，你是来杀我的吗？！请不要，请不要！

original: Okay, I tricked, sorry.  I was able to make the medicine without the help of these berries.  I just wanted to enjoy their great taste again.  They taste so magical, like heavenly honey.  As if the angels themselves descended from heaven and planted berries from their paradise gardens on earth.  My friend, you should try them too!  They are wonderful, have wonderful, just delicious taste.  Do you want me to give you one such berry?  I have one left and I want to share this enchanting nectar with you.
translation: 好吧，我被骗了，对不起。没有这些浆果的帮助，我就能做出这种药。我只想再次享受他们的美味。它们的味道很神奇，就像天上的蜂蜜。仿佛天使们自己从天堂降临，从他们的天堂花园里种下浆果。我的朋友，你也应该试试！它们很好，很好，只是味道很好。你要我给你一个这样的浆果吗？我还有一杯，我想和你分享这迷人的花蜜。

original: Okay, I'll look for someone else.
translation: 好吧，我去找其他人。

original: Okay, just be fast.  Be careful not to attract the <zombies>.
translation: 好吧，快点。小心别吸引僵尸。

original: Okay, let's do it nicely.  We play a game of dice.  I win - you pay me 5 merch.  You win - you take the payment.  What do you say?
translation: 好吧，我们好好干吧。我们玩骰子游戏。我赢了-你付我5块钱。你赢了-你接受付款。你怎么说？

original: Okay, wait here."  He ran away somewhere, giggling loudly.  Five minutes later, he came running, panting and grunting, trying to persuade you to duck.  At the same moment, an explosion thundered at an impressive volume.  "Everything is ready, <name_g>.  The path is open.
translation: 好吧，在这儿等着。”他咯咯笑着跑掉了。五分钟后，他跑了过来，气喘吁吁，试图说服你躲开。与此同时，爆炸声震耳欲聋，震耳欲聋。”一切都准备好了，<name_g>。这条路是敞开的。

original: Okay, you convinced me.  Listen here, <name_g>.  This representative has long suspected that there is a informant here, and as you can see, it is.  Since they hired you to end this, then they is already at the limit, and will not stop until they see the corpse of a informant.  To knock them off the trail, we need to frame someone.  Find some loser guard and try to make an provocation for a fight, and then, as if 'accidentally' inflict several wounds, preferably fatal.  After that, go to the representative.  I think they take it and calm down after that.  When you solve the problem with a representative, come to me and then we'll talk.
translation: 好吧，你说服了我。听着，<name_g>。这位代表长期以来一直怀疑这里有一个线人，正如你所看到的，确实有。既然他们雇你来结束这一切，那么他们已经到了极限，除非他们看到线人的尸体，否则不会罢休。为了把他们赶跑，我们需要陷害一个人。找一个失败者守卫，试图挑起一场战斗，然后，就好像“意外”造成几处伤口，最好是致命的。之后，去找代表。我想他们接受了，然后冷静下来。当你和一个代表解决问题时，来找我，然后我们再谈。

original: One deck of cards and I'm yours for a day.  No pun intended.
translation: 一副牌，我一天都是你的。没有双关语。

original: One of the Hell's Raiders gang of hooligans and bandits that preys upon other survivors.  Hardy, militaristic partisans, that was hiding in woods for too long, decided to finally use their knowledge and training to their own good.
translation: 一个地狱的袭击者团伙的流氓和强盗，掠夺其他幸存者。顽强的军国主义游击队，躲在树林里太久了，最终决定利用他们的知识和训练来造福自己。

original: One of the Hell's Raiders gang of hooligans and bandits that preys upon other survivors.  Junkies, bike freaks and other iron-horse-lovers that rides on desolated streets on their roaring horses of freedom.
translation: 一个地狱的袭击者团伙的流氓和强盗，掠夺其他幸存者。吸毒者，骑自行车的怪胎和其他铁马爱好者骑在荒凉的街道上咆哮的自由马。

original: One of the Hell's Raiders gang of hooligans and bandits that preys upon other survivors.  Merchants, shady dealers and other black market workers that decided to unite in front of growing zombies danger.
translation: 一个地狱的袭击者团伙的流氓和强盗，掠夺其他幸存者。商人，阴暗的商人和其他黑市工人决定团结在日益增长的僵尸面前。

original: One of the Hell's Raiders gang of hooligans and bandits that preys upon other survivors.  Yes.
translation: 一个地狱的袭击者团伙的流氓和强盗，掠夺其他幸存者。对。

original: One scrap cuirass and I'm yours for a day.  No pun intended.
translation: 一片胸甲，我就属于你一天。没有双关语。

original: Orange liquid.
translation: 橙色液体。

original: Our center was a secret facility with good security, and the number of guards there was appropriate.  Fortunately, due to the current situation, the guards will not be able to use their weapons against you.
translation: 我们的中心是一个秘密设施，有很好的安全，那里的警卫人数是适当的。幸运的是，由于目前的情况，警卫将无法使用他们的武器对付你。

original: Pack of C4.
translation: 一包C4。

original: Pack your stuff, we're going to your new home.
translation: 收拾好你的东西，我们去你的新家。

original: Package delivery
translation: 包裹递送

original: Package?  Okay, give it to me then.
translation: 包裹？好吧，那就给我。

original: Payment?  We have already discussed everything with Mister T.  Your business is to give me the package.
translation: 付款？我们已经和T先生谈过了。你的事是把包裹给我。

original: Pharmacy.
translation: 药房。

original: Phew, you look normal again.  I'm <very> glad that worked well, <name_g>.  You know, I don't want to engage in such experimentation anymore.  It's time to rest a little.  By the way, I have some leftovers here, I'll throw them out of harm's way.  You can take some of this if you want.
translation: 唷，你看起来又正常了。我很高兴<very>运行良好，<name_g>。你知道，我不想再做这样的实验了。是时候休息一下了。顺便说一下，我这里有些剩菜，我会把它们扔掉的。如果你想的话，可以吃点这个。

original: Place transmitter
translation: 放置发射器

original: Please don't hurt me!
translation: 请不要伤害我！

original: Please hurry, doc…
translation: 请快点，医生…

original: Please, you are our last hope!
translation: 拜托，你是我们最后的希望！

original: Please, you're my last hope!
translation: 拜托，你是我最后的希望！

original: Police weapons.
translation: 警察的武器。

original: Preparations for the move are in full swing.  Now, I have a small personal request.  We sailed to this state by ship, but it was attacked by some <monster>.  At first, we were able to fight him off, but he brought his friends with him and the sides of our ship quickly turned into a sieve.  We had to quickly leave it, leaving our personal belongings and various supplies behind.  The thing is, I had to give up something important, and I would like to return it.  Will you help me?
translation: 此举的准备工作正如火如荼地进行。现在，我有一个小小的个人要求。我们乘船到了这个州，但遭到了一些怪物的袭击。起初，我们能把他击退，但他带着他的朋友，我们的船很快就变成了筛子。我们不得不迅速离开，留下我们的个人物品和各种用品。问题是，我不得不放弃一些重要的东西，我想把它还回去。你能帮我吗？

original: Prepare to die, pig!
translation: 准备死吧，猪！

original: Protect bandit
translation: 护匪

original: Protect goon
translation: 保护傻瓜

original: Protect slave
translation: 保护从机

original: Psst, come here.
translation: 嘘，过来。

original: Psst, hey, you, come 'ere, <name_g>.
translation: 嘘，嘿，你，过来，<name_g>。

original: RM103A.
translation: 103A令吉。

original: RM11B.
translation: 11b令吉。

original: RM120c.
RM51.
translation: 51令吉。

original: Raid Refugee Center
translation: 突袭难民中心

original: Raid Refugee Center and kill Merchant, Broker, Doctor and OG Rep.
translation: 突袭难民中心，杀死商人，经纪人，医生和OG代表。

original: Raid Refugee Center and kill everyone inside.  If you need help, take my men with you, they can help you.  You're free to go.
translation: 突袭难民中心，杀死里面的所有人。如果你需要帮助，带上我的人，他们会帮助你的。你可以走了。

original: Rainbow liquid.
translation: 彩虹液体。

original: Rare Beast
translation: 稀有野兽

original: Rare weapons.
translation: 稀有武器。

original: Razorclaw roe
translation: 剃须刀鱼子

original: Receipt for buying cattle.
translation: 买牛的收据。

original: Recruitment?
translation: 招聘？

original: Red Suns
translation: 红太阳

original: Red Suns.
translation: 红色的太阳。

original: Red liquid.
translation: 红色液体。

original: Regular family that just want to survive in this new world.
translation: 普通家庭只想在这个新世界生存。

original: Relax, i'm working on it.
translation: 别紧张，我正在努力。

original: Remember to do some scouting before you start.  If you can, from the inside.  Find out the route of their patrols, the sentry posts, all that.
translation: 开始前记得做一些侦察。如果可以，从内部。找出他们巡逻的路线，岗哨，等等。

original: Repel attack of Free Merchants on Refugee Center.
translation: 击退自由商人对难民中心的攻击。

original: Research Materials
translation: 研究材料

original: Retaliation
translation: 报复

original: Retrieve scientist
translation: 检索科学家

original: Rifle ammo.
translation: 步枪子弹。

original: Rookie, why are you not on… oh, it's you again.  I mistook you for someone else, sorry.  We're still doing this <swear> construction, and these <swear> <name_b>'s don't want to work!  I'm busy with another important job right now, so I can't kick all these <name_b>'s asses.  Help me put together a construction team, and I will make it worth your while.
translation: 菜鸟，你为什么不上…哦，又是你。对不起，我把你错当成别人了。我们还在做这个<swear>建设，这些<sware><name_b>的不想工作！我现在正忙着另一项重要的工作，所以我不能踢这些人的屁股。帮我组建一个施工队，我会让你觉得值得的。

original: Rosalyn!
translation: 罗莎琳！

original: Royal jelly
translation: 蜂王浆

original: Rude.
translation: 粗鲁无礼。

original: Run, I need to run, where to run…
translation: 跑，我要跑，跑哪…

original: SAVE ME PLEASE!
translation: 请救救我！

original: SAVE ME PLEASE! KILL THOSE ROBOTS!
translation: 请救救我！杀了那些机器人！

original: Scavenger asked you to bring him to refugee center, to his friends - Free Merchants.
translation: 拾荒者让你们把他带到难民中心，给他的朋友——自由商人。

original: Scientist asked you to find her old lab notes, needed for her work.
translation: 科学家让你找到她工作所需的旧实验笔记。

original: Seriously?  It's such an easy job…
translation: 说真的？这是一件很容易的工作…

original: Shakalaka
translation: 沙卡拉卡

original: She looks like a nice girl.
translation: 她看起来像个好女孩。

original: She's here, alive and well.
translation: 她在这里，还活着。

original: Shod?
translation: 穿什么？

original: Shotgun ammo.
translation: 散弹枪子弹。

original: Shove your threats up your ass, <name_b>.
translation: 把你的威胁塞到你的屁股上，<name_b>。

original: Show me what you've got!
translation: 给我看看你有什么！

original: Show what you are capable of.
translation: 展示你的能力。

original: Since you have appreciated my contribution, maybe you decide to reward me for it?
translation: 既然你很欣赏我的贡献，也许你决定奖励我？

original: Sky blue liquid.
translation: 天蓝色液体。

original: Small foodpack with dish inside, cooked with love and care specially for you.
translation: 小菜包，内有菜，专为您精心烹制。

original: So be it, wanderer.
translation: 就这样吧，流浪者。

original: So listen here, rookie… oh, it's you.  I confused you with one of my soldiers.  We are planning to strengthen the defense of our camp, and this task fell on my shoulders.  I need 150 rolls of barbed wire.  We, of course, do not have such a quantity, but if you can find me some of it, I will make it worth your while.
translation: 听着，菜鸟…哦，是你。我把你和我的一个士兵搞混了。我们正计划加强我们营地的防御，这项任务落在我的肩上。我需要150卷铁丝网。当然，我们没有这样的数量，但是如果你能给我找到一些，我会让它值得你的。

original: So, I still need to deliver that package.  Conditions are the same.
